comparison.title: Why Peppol Light instead of ABCinvoice?

why.a: Peppol Light offers an automatic conformity score, a simple fixed subscription model, and downloadable reports. Ideal for Belgian freelancers and SMEs.

change.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Plan changes are immediate.

lifetime.q: Is the Business plan really unlimited?
lifetime.a: Yes. The Business plan has no monthly invoice limit. Optional add-ons such as "+10 folders pack", "API Access", and "White-label" are available as extras.

payment.a: To activate a plan, send us an email via the button of your chosen plan. We will send you a secure Stripe payment link. Your subscription starts immediately after payment.

trial.a: Yes! The FREE plan allows you to test with 3 invoices/month. You will see the conformity score and the complete PDF report.
